tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Moon and Sun. Wisdom and will.~May the earth yield for us this season.~Peace, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value

xtagTextFragments.Activity: roaming around idly,scrounging for food,napping under the high salt sun
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: sleeping in our homes,eating our food
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the act of procreating,shade from the salt sun,naps,abundant food

xtagTextFragments.Activity: chirping at peers,singing birdsong,nesting,basking in the sun
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: chirping at us,basking in the sun,belting out birdsong
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to hide in my nest,to chirp at
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the art of speech and song,prattle,the gift of flight,worms,the salt-strewn air

xtagTextFragments.Activity: sleeping and chasing birds all through the day

xtagTextFragments.PoeticFeatures: ageless shelf of shell,titanic claws,stilted eyes
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: reinforcing the walls of our homes

xtagTextFragments.Activity: swimming in circles,nibbling algae,laying eggs,nestling in brineweed
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: nestling in our brineweed,laying its eggs
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to hide in the water

xtagTextFragments.Activity: droning for the hive,burrowing into the earth,rummaging through dung
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: fastidiously nesting,multiplying in droves,laying eggs and clicking
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to nest more effectively,for my hive
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: chirping by the light of the Beetle Moon,xenophagy,hexapoda,larvae,chitin,the protection of an exoskeleton

xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,for resorbing purposes,so I can engulf it,to absorb it

xtagTextFragments.Activity: basking in the sun,reclining on warm rocks,hissing under the Beetle Moon,swallowing insects
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: basking in the sun,reclining on warm rocks,hissing under the Beetle Moon
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to sit on and keep me warm,for hissing at

xtagTextFragments.Activity: basking in the sun,reclining on warm rocks,croaking under the Beetle Moon,swallowing insects
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: basking in the sun,reclining on warm rocks,croaking under the Beetle Moon
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to sit on and keep me warm,for croaking at

xtagTextFragments.Activity: plodding along,inside shells,napping in the shade
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to hide in my shell
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the sanctum of a hollow place,the carapace,vegetables,peace and quiet,the home

xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: bathing in our stews,undulating near our stews
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: having neither arms nor legs nor a head

xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: bathing in our stews, making worm stews of our stews

xtagTextFragments.Activity: recompositing meaning from centuries of bit flips

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: &w*beep boop*&y~&w*boop beep*&y~&w*beep boop beep*&y~&w*boop beep boop*&y

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stilt pistons fire in alternating quatro and tote the miner and =pronouns.possessive= mines in esoteric patterns across the ground. When =pronouns.possessive= topographic instincts are sated, a hatch opens and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:lay:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= explosive egg.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= cylindric head is embellished with a frilly crest whose symbolism is unknown. =pronouns.Subjective= dutifully =verb:march:afterpronoun= on a pair of chrome pistons toward =pronouns.possessive= final purpose.

xtagTextFragments.PoeticFeatures: tall forehead,outstretched legs,eyes full of wonder
xtagTextFragments.Activity: going about the tedious work of speaking to peers,hunting and gathering,wandering the salt dunes
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: sleeping in our bedrolls and sitting in our chairs,lounging around,reading books,peeling and eating musa
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to inspire my art,to inspire my poetry,to be my muse,to help with farm work,for the games we play under the Beetle Moon
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the act of procreating,philosophy,alcohol,grains of the earth,stone fruit,artistry,poetry,warm meals,bread and wine,pottery,painting
xtagTextFragments.ArableLand: arable land,livestock,the bounty of the earth

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Moon and Sun. Wisdom and will.~May the earth yield for us this season.~Peace, =player.formalAddressTerm=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet nostrils flare at the seat of =pronouns.possessive= dropped snout, and furry arms wave in unpredicted motions. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes are full of stony mischief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wind presses a sunbleached thawb and neckdress against a humanoid form. The fabric is embroidered to rhyme with patterns in the salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratched scales lay in a coiled mound.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Oiled and brushed mail hang across =pronouns.possessive= crooked spine and salient jaw. The color too was sucked out of =pronouns.possessive= irises by =pronouns.possessive= tangled lineage, and =pronouns.possessive= wet rosy lips catch the light and toss it back across a sharp sneer.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: basking in the sun,swaying in the wind,putting roots down in the ground,being crawled over by insects
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: basking in the sun,putting roots down in the ground,swaying in the wind
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,for burying in the soil,to impress the other plants
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: carbon dioxide,the sun,water,laying roots,drinking water from the soil,every hue of green

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: {{emote|*The plant gives no indication of understanding*.}}
